data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
data.author: Ronald Reagan

data.quote: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: If we desire a society of peace, then we cannot achieve such a society through violence. If we desire a society without discrimination, then we must not discriminate against anyone in the process of building this society. If we desire a society that is democratic, then democracy must become a means as well as an end.
data.author: Bayard Rustin

data.quote: So many people live within unhappy circumstances and yet will not take the initiative to change their situation because they are conditioned to a life of security, conformity, and conservation, all of which may appear to give one peace of mind, but in reality, nothing is more damaging to the adventurous spirit.
data.author: Christopher McCandless

data.quote: I see the world being slowly transformed into a wilderness; I hear the approaching thunder that, one day, will destroy us too. I feel the suffering of millions. And yet, when I look up at the sky, I somehow feel that everything will change for the better, that this cruelty too shall end, that peace and tranquility will return once more.
data.author: Anne Frank

data.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: You'll never find peace of mind until you listen to your heart.
data.author: George Michael

data.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: Every breath we take, every step we make, can be filled with peace, joy and serenity.
data.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

data.quote: Motherhood has taught me the meaning of living in the moment and being at peace. Children don't think about yesterday, and they don't think about tomorrow. They just exist in the moment.
data.author: Jessalyn Gilsig

data.quote: Our peace shall stand as firm as rocky mountains.
data.author: William Shakespeare

data.quote: Peace is a daily, a weekly, a monthly process, gradually changing opinions, slowly eroding old barriers, quietly building new structures.

data.quote: The greatest destroyer of peace is abortion because if a mother can kill her own child, what is left for me to kill you and you to kill me? There is nothing between.
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.quote: Obsessed by a fairy tale, we spend our lives searching for a magic door and a lost kingdom of peace.
data.author: Eugene O'Neill

data.quote: When you've seen beyond yourself, then you may find, peace of mind is waiting there.
data.author: George Harrison

data.quote: Nobody can bring you peace but yourself.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: The meaning of peace is the absence of opposition to socialism.

data.quote: Never be in a hurry; do everything quietly and in a calm spirit. Do not lose your inner peace for anything whatsoever, even if your whole world seems upset.
data.author: Saint Francis de Sales

data.quote: It is absolutely necessary, for the peace and safety of mankind, that some of earth's dark, dead corners and unplumbed depths be let alone; lest sleeping abnormalities wake to resurgent life, and blasphemously surviving nightmares squirm and splash out of their black lairs to newer and wider conquests.
data.author: H. P. Lovecraft

data.quote: To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring - it was peace.
data.author: Milan Kundera

data.quote: Neutrality is a negative word. It does not express what America ought to feel. We are not trying to keep out of trouble we are trying to preserve the foundations on which peace may be rebuilt.

data.quote: So long as there is imperialism in the world, a permanent peace is impossible.
data.author: Hassan Nasrallah

data.quote: It's never nice to lose someone close to you; unfortunately, life goes on, and we have to make peace with it and move on.
data.author: Francois Hougaard

data.quote: Democracy is necessary to peace and to undermining the forces of terrorism.
data.author: Benazir Bhutto

data.quote: He is happiest, be he king or peasant, who finds peace in his home.
data.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

data.quote: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: Avoid popularity if you would have peace.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.author: Thomas Kinkade

data.author: George W. Bush

data.quote: Peace is not merely a distant goal that we seek, but a means by which we arrive at that goal.
data.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

data.quote: Peace is more important than all justice; and peace was not made for the sake of justice, but justice for the sake of peace.

data.quote: I'm just hoping that people understand that Islam is peace and not violence.

data.quote: Acceptance looks like a passive state, but in reality it brings something entirely new into this world. That peace, a subtle energy vibration, is consciousness.

data.quote: I took a deep breath and listened to the old bray of my heart. I am. I am. I am.
data.author: Sylvia Plath

data.quote: Peace of mind for five minutes, that's what I crave.
data.author: Alanis Morissette

data.quote: You can't separate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom.

data.quote: The world must be made safe for democracy. Its peace must be planted upon the tested foundations of political liberty.

data.quote: People respond in accordance to how you relate to them. If you approach them on the basis of violence, that's how they'll react. But if you say, 'We want peace, we want stability,' we can then do a lot of things that will contribute towards the progress of our society.

data.quote: Little else is requisite to carry a state to the highest degree of opulence from the lowest barbarism but peace, easy taxes, and a tolerable administration of justice: all the rest being brought about by the natural course of things.

data.quote: Peace, above all things, is to be desired, but blood must sometimes be spilled to obtain it on equable and lasting terms.

data.quote: Barbecue may not be the road to world peace, but it's a start.

data.quote: My dream is to live a good life and be loving, be close to God and be a good human being and bring peace to people.

data.quote: Terrorism is a significant threat to peace and security, prosperity and people.

data.quote: Revenge, lust, ambition, pride, and self-will are too often exalted as the gods of man's idolatry; while holiness, peace, contentment, and humility are viewed as unworthy of a serious thought.

data.quote: Our stories come from our lives and from the playwright's pen, the mind of the actor, the roles we create, the artistry of life itself and the quest for peace.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: When resources are degraded, we start competing for them, whether it is at the local level in Kenya, where we had tribal clashes over land and water, or at the global level, where we are fighting over water, oil, and minerals. So one way to promote peace is to promote sustainable management and equitable distribution of resources.

data.quote: We have a vision of South Africa in which black and white shall live and work together as equals in conditions of peace and prosperity.

data.quote: You find that you have peace of mind and can enjoy yourself, get more sleep, and rest when you know that it was a one hundred percent effort that you gave - win or lose.

data.quote: We know that dictators are quick to choose aggression, while free nations strive to resolve differences in peace.

data.quote: I believe that eyes are very important motifs. That's something that can discern the peace and love.

data.quote: The lessons from the peace process are clear; whatever life throws at us, our individual responses will be all the stronger for working together and sharing the load.

data.quote: The only peace that can be made with a dictator is once that must be based on deterrence. For today, the dictator may be your friend, but tomorrow he will need you as an enemy.

data.quote: As long as man continues to be the ruthless destroyer of lower living beings he will never know health or peace. For as long as men massacre animals, they will kill each other.

data.quote: When I decide who to vote for as president, I ask myself who will be best for America and for the world. data.quote: We do not want riches, we want peace and love.

data.quote: I'm all about peace. I'm all about unity. I'm all about love.

data.quote: Water is always a support or a healing thing apart from, you know, love or peace of mind.

data.quote: Peace is its own reward.

data.quote: We want peace and development in all 10 states of South Sudan - we don't want military backing.

data.quote: They may call me a sinner, but I am at peace with myself.

data.quote: Let me just say: Peace to you, if you're willing to fight for it.

data.quote: If there must be trouble, let it be in my day, that my child may have peace.

data.quote: True humility is contentment.

data.quote: Even peace may be purchased at too high a price.

data.quote: An army of principles can penetrate where an army of soldiers cannot.
data.author: Thomas Paine

data.quote: First keep peace with yourself, then you can also bring peace to others.

data.quote: Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace.

data.quote: Today, we have two Vietnams, side by side, North and South, exchanging and working. We may not agree with all that North Vietnam is doing, but they are living in peace. I would look for a better human rights record for North Vietnam, but they are living side by side.

data.quote: Give a child love, laughter and peace, not AIDS.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: I had daydreams and fantasies when I was growing up. I always wanted to live in a log cabin at the foot of a mountain. I would ride my horse to town and pick up provisions. Then return to the cabin, with a big open fire, a record player and peace.

data.quote: Nothing has brought me more love, joy and peace than being a good husband and good daddy.
data.author: Frank Abagnale

data.quote: Peace is a day-to-day problem, the product of a multitude of events and judgments. Peace is not an 'is,' it is a 'becoming.'
data.author: Haile Selassie

data.quote: The purpose of all wars, is peace.

data.quote: Every goal, every action, every thought, every feeling one experiences, whether it be consciously or unconsciously known, is an attempt to increase one's level of peace of mind.
data.author: Sydney Madwed

data.quote: To attain inner peace you must actually give your life, not just your possessions. When you at last give your life - bringing into alignment your beliefs and the way you live then, and only then, can you begin to find inner peace.

data.quote: Care less for your harvest than for how it is shared and your life will have meaning and your heart will have peace.

data.quote: We should use our old moral values and our love of peace as the foundation of national reconstruction and look forward to the day when we shall become leaders in world reconstruction upon lines of international justice and good will.

data.quote: Before we went on any protest, whether it was sit-ins or the freedom rides or any march, we prepared ourselves, and we were disciplined. We were committed to the way of peace - the way of non-violence - the way of love - the way of life as the way of living.

data.quote: My belief is in the chaos of the world and that you have to find your peace within the chaos and that you still have to find some sort of mission.

data.quote: As an artist I come to sing, but as a citizen, I will always speak for peace, and no one can silence me in this.

data.quote: Every human longs for peace and love.
data.author: Hiawatha

data.quote: Our souls may lose their peace and even disturb other people's, if we are always criticizing trivial actions - which often are not real defects at all, but we construe them wrongly through our ignorance of their motives.

data.quote: The Union, which can alone insure internal peace, and external security to each State, Must and Shall be Preserved, cost what it may in time, treasure, and blood.

data.quote: The United States has the burden to lead for peace. And not just peace - we need peace with justice, a much harder goal.

data.quote: Peace is a natural effect of trade.

data.quote: There is no greater feeling than hanging out with my dogs, or just walking around the land with our horses. My rescue ranch is is where I feel the most at peace and where I'm reminded of the simple things in life and let the chaos of my crazy work life fade away.

data.quote: After four years at the United Nations I sometimes yearn for the peace and tranquility of a political convention.
data.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

data.quote: There can never be peace between nations until there is first known that true peace which is within the souls of men.
data.author: Black Elk

data.quote: But, my dear sirs, when peace does come, you may call on me for any thing. Then will I share with you the last cracker, and watch with you to shield your homes and families against danger from every quarter.
data.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

data.quote: Peace secured by slavish submission is not peace.
data.author: Kim Il-sung

data.quote: A conqueror is always a lover of peace.
data.author: Carl von Clausewitz

data.quote: Peace without justice is tyranny.
data.author: William Allen White

data.quote: Take away the violence and who will hear the men of peace?
data.author: Lorraine Hansberry

data.quote: You may gain temporary appeasement by a policy of concession to violence, but you do not gain lasting peace that way.
data.author: Anthony Eden

data.quote: We all lose somebody we care about and want to find some comforting way of dealing with it, something that will give us a little closure, a little peace.
data.author: Mitch Albom

data.quote: Nothing is wrong with peace and love. It is all the more regrettable that so many of Christ's followers seem to disagree.
data.author: Richard Dawkins

data.quote: I believe that peace with the Palestinians is most urgent - urgent than ever before. It is necessary. It is crucial. It is possible. A delay may worsen its chances. Israel and the Palestinians are, in my judgment, ripe today to restart the peace process.
data.author: Shimon Peres

data.quote: Peace is something very dear. If you've been through wars and operations and battles, you want peace.
data.author: Benjamin Netanyahu

data.quote: I do believe in God. But you won't find me visiting temples every now and then. I believe in self-realization. Peace of mind matters a lot to me. What's the point in doing something just for the sake of it? I'd rather do something I like doing as long as I'm being true to myself.
data.author: Virat Kohli

data.quote: Everything I want to do, and to accomplish, is on the other side of the universe. That's peace of mind, energy, freedom. And I'm making myself ready to go, joyfully and willingly. I think I'm ready to be everybody's friend, and to do anything for anybody. It's heavy.
data.author: Richie Havens

data.quote: The question that we must ask is whether we are making progress toward the goal of universal peace. Or are we caught up on a treadmill of history, turning forever on the axle of mindless aggression and self-destruction?
data.author: F. W. de Klerk

data.quote: In our quest for peace, we should constantly ask ourselves what we should do to create conditions in which peace can prosper.
data.author: F. W. de Klerk

data.quote: Some might complain that nuclear disarmament is little more than a dream. But that ignores the very tangible benefits disarmament would bring for all humankind. Its success would strengthen international peace and security. It would free up vast and much-needed resources for social and economic development. It would advance the rule of law.
data.author: Ban Ki-moon

data.quote: Don't stand back with your arms folded

data.quote: I will go on my knees and ask the Liberian people to participate in bringing peace and stability to our country.
data.author: George Weah

data.quote: Economic integration is the path to riches and peace.
data.author: Edward C. Prescott

data.quote: I am looking forward and I am hoping that I will be the catalyst that makes India and Pakistan live for peace forever.
data.author: Asif Ali Zardari

data.quote: When I received the news of the Nobel Peace Award, I could not believe it. I told my father, 'I think they have the wrong name, Dad. Please, can you talk to this man on the phone? I'm busy cooking!'
data.author: Betty Williams

data.quote: Peace is not wimpy. It's about sitting down and negotiating with people you hate. Ultimately, all occupation ends, and you have to deal with the enemy.
data.author: Betty Williams

data.quote: Someday when peace has returned to this odd world I want to come to London again and stand on a certain balcony on a moonlit night and look down upon the peaceful silver curve of the Thames with its dark bridges.
data.author: Ernie Pyle

data.quote: For hundreds of millions of Americans who believe in God, prayer is our bridge between Earth and Heaven, our way of opening our hearts to the Lord. Through this intimate relationship we find peace and guidance.
data.author: Nick Rahall

data.quote: When I create an image that helps someone - even just myself - find peace, then I've attained my goal.
data.author: Evelyn Lauder

data.quote: After living out of a suitcase for years, it's a feeling of peace to wake up in the night and know where I am.
data.author: Patty Loveless

data.quote: I wish the Peace Corps and its volunteers continued success and perseverance. We are grateful for their contributions to society and dedication to providing assistance where it is needed. May the Peace Corps continue its legacy of service, both at home and abroad.
data.author: Kenny Marchant

data.quote: As a civil rights leader, Mrs. King's vision of racial peace and nonviolent social change was a fortifying staple in advancing the civil rights movement.
data.author: James T. Walsh

data.quote: Man does find in Nature deliverance from himself, oblivion of his past, with peace and purity!
data.author: George A. Smith

data.quote: Of one thing I am certain, the body is not the measure of healing, peace is the measure.
data.author: Phyllis McGinley

data.quote: If the union between England and America is a powerful factor in the cause of peace, a new Triple Alliance between the Teutonic race and the two branches of the Anglo-Saxon race will be a still more potent influence in the future of the world.
data.author: Edward Grey

data.quote: Peace has to be created, in order to be maintained. It will never be achieved by passivity and quietism.
data.author: Dorothy Thompson

data.quote: I want peace. I want to see if somewhere there isn't something left in life of charm and grace.
data.author: Margaret Mitchell

data.quote: We love peace, but not peace at any price.
data.author: Douglas William Jerrold

data.quote: We have to acknowledge peace is in danger and mankind still has not realised the priority to be given to world dialogue versus armed contradiction and bloodshed.
data.author: Nursultan Nazarbayev

data.quote: We call upon all sides to stop hostilities and restart peace talks.
data.author: Nursultan Nazarbayev

data.quote: I don't know whether war is an interlude during peace, or peace an interlude during war.
data.author: Georges Clemenceau

data.quote: It seems to be that when these communist regimes take over - if you look at the example of Vietnam or Cambodia or Nicaragua - that even in conditions of peace they don't seem to be able to figure out how to support their people, and the human suffering is enormous.
data.author: John Negroponte

data.quote: Peace is not the product of a victory or a command. It has no finishing line, no final deadline, no fixed definition of achievement. Peace is a never-ending process, the work of many decisions.
data.author: Oscar Hammerstein II

data.quote: If the world would only build temples to Machinery in the abstract then everything would be perfect. The painter and sculptor would have plenty to do, and could, in complete peace and suitably honored, pursue their trade without further trouble.
data.author: Wyndham Lewis

data.quote: We should learn to live and love our neighbors as ourselves for the sake of peace and progress.
data.author: David McCallum

data.quote: A babe in the house is a well-spring of pleasure, a messenger of peace and love, a resting place for innocence on earth, a link between angels and men.
data.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

data.quote: May peace rule the universe, may peace rule in kingdoms and empires, may peace rule in states and in the lands of the potentates, may peace rule in the house of friends and may peace also rule in the house of enemies.
data.author: Virchand Gandhi

data.quote: The quest for peace begins in the home, in the school and in the workplace.
data.author: Silvia Cartwright

data.quote: The Dove, on silver pinions, winged her peaceful way.
data.author: James Montgomery

data.quote: If I'm going to be staying up until 3 A.M., it should be for world peace and not shampoo sales.
data.author: Mona Sutphen

data.quote: I declare that I will establish peace in this world.
data.author: Prem Rawat

data.quote: Be at peace with your own soul, then heaven and earth will be at peace with you.
data.author: Isaac of Nineveh

data.quote: When I play with my band around the U.S.A., the most requested song is 'Peace Frog.'
data.author: Robby Krieger

data.quote: Every time I'm in Georgia, I eat a peach for peace.
data.author: Duane Allman

data.quote: A State in the grip of neo-colonialism is not master of its own destiny. It is this factor which makes neo-colonialism such a serious threat to world peace.
data.author: Kwame Nkrumah

data.quote: Peace is the first thing the angels sang.
data.author: John Keble

data.quote: In the whole round of human affairs little is so fatal to peace as misunderstanding.
data.author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

data.quote: This is an era of violent peace.
data.author: James D. Watkins

data.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
data.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

data.quote: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.
data.author: Kenneth Branagh

data.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.quote: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
data.author: Sholom Aleichem
